name: Alarak
title: Highlord of the Tal'darim
description: A combo Assasin that can move enemies around and punish mistakes.

primary.name: Discord Strike
primary.description: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

primary.name: Telekinesis
primary.description: Create a force, pushing Alarak and all enemies hit from the targeted point towards the targeted direction. Deals 48 damage to enemies.

primary.name: Lighting Surge
primary.description: Deal 100 damage to an enemy and all enemies between Alarak and his victim. 75% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes is returned as health.

primary.name: Counter-Strike
primary.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

primary.name: Deadly Charge
primary.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds.

Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

primary.name: Sadism
primary.description: Alarak deals 100% more Ability damage versus enemy Heroes.

1.name: Applied Force
1.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but Telekinesis pushes 20% further.

1.name: Power Conduit
1.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Lightning Surge by 10.

4.name: Double Cross
4.description: Increases the range of Discord Strike by 25% and also hits in a line perpendicular to the forward strike.

4.name: Reckless Strike
4.description: Reduces the delay of Discord Strike by 0.25 seconds but if it hits an enemy, Alarak's Armor is lowered by 25 for 2 seconds, causing him to take 25% more damage.

4.name: Cycle of Discord
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Discord Strike by 2 seconds. If Discord Strike fails to hit any enemies, the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

7.name: Chaos Reigns
7.questDescription: Each time Discord Strike hits a Hero its damage increases by 3, up to 45.
7.rewardDescription: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase its damage by an additional 45.

7.name: Endless Energy
7.questDescription: Heroes hit between Alarak and his victim permanently decreases the cooldown of Lightning Surge by 0.2 seconds, up to 2 seconds.

7.name: Thunderstruck
7.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10%, but causes Lightning Surge to slow enemies hit between Alarak and his victim by 70% for 2 seconds.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 208 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds.

Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 286 damage.

13.name: Dissonance
13.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but increases Discord Strike's silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Psychokinesis
13.description: Increases the damage of Telekinesis by 100%.

13.name: Hindered Motion
13.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but causes Telekinesis to slow enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.description: Any time an allied Hero dies, Alarak's Sadism bonus is increased by 8%, stacking up to 40%. This bonus Sadism cannot be consumed by Hasty Bargain and is lost on death.

16.name: Quick Mind
16.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% and the cooldown of Telekinesis by 6 seconds.

16.name: Projected Force
16.description: Reduces the damage bonus of Sadism by 10% but increases the range of Telekinesis by 25%.

16.name: Sustaining Power
16.description: Increases the healing Alarak receives from dealing damage to Heroes with Lightning Surge by 30%.

16.name: Negatively Charged
16.description: Increases damage dealt to enemies between Alarak and his victim of Lightning Surge by 100%, but does not generate any additional healing.

20.name: Counter-Strike
20.description:
Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 286 (+4% per level) damage.

 This ability will take over your Trait button.

20.name: Deadly Charge
20.description:
After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 208 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.625 seconds. 

Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. 

Taking damage will interrupt the channeling. This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

20.name: Last Laugh
20.description: Activate to remove all roots, slows, and damage over time effects and teleport to the chosen location. Activating Last Laugh will immediately reduce Alarak's Health to 1.

20.name: Hasty Bargain
20.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism bonus by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.
